definition: in a satisfactory or adequate manner, being satisfactory or in satisfactory condition, an endorsement, to give sanction to
details:
adverb
- in a satisfactory or adequate manner
= example: in a satisfactory or adequate manner
= synonyms: O.K., all right, alright
adjective
- being satisfactory or in satisfactory condition
= example: being satisfactory or in satisfactory condition
= synonyms: all right, fine, hunky-dory
noun
- an endorsement
= example: an endorsement
= synonyms: O.K., OK, okey,
verb
- to give sanction to
= example: to give sanction to
= synonyms: sanction
